name: Adlez
description:
Adlez is a 2D action-adventure game about a hero conquering dungeons and defeating monsters on a search for his lost friend. Players will control the hero on his adventure, solving puzzles, collecting items and defeating bosses in three unique dungeons.

I created Adlez over the course of four months in a team with two of my classmates. Tasked with creating an original video game of our choosing, we were inspired by the 2D Legend of Zelda games we grew up on.
